column5: We leave next week for our Fly In at Cochrane Air Services, to Unknown Lake. Quick question? Hows the black flies? Skeeters?  Thanks
Northern Ontario + June = you have to ask?  bring lots of N. Ontario Cologne (DEET)
Have to agree with Raf here
Thanks ... Just thought I would ask. People were telling me the Black Flies are done right now due to the early Spring?

I was up in that area last week end and the Black flies were the worst I have ever seen them.  The locals that we fish with were even complaining and they never complain about anything.  Make sure you bring bug nets
How are the bugs up in the cochrane area? We are leaving thursday for our fishing trip!!
I swear by those Thermocells. I use 2 of them when camping and I found they do a great job......in a windy situation you just need to "play the wind".
